request.description: Send an email using a database-driven template with simplified variables. The template structure is stored in the database and referenced by key. This is the main endpoint for sending emails through the gateway.

body.raw:

    "email": "noreply@waymore.io",
    "name": "Waymore System"

  "subject": "Password Reset Request",

    "key": "forgot-password",
    "locale": "__base__"

  "to": [
    {
      "email": "{{recipient_email}}",
      "name": "{{recipient_name}}"

  "variables": {
    "user.name": "{{user_firstname}}",

    "reset.url": "https://app.waymore.io/reset-password?token=abc123",
    "reset.expiry_minutes": "30",
    "security.request_ip": "192.168.1.1",
    "security.request_location": "New York, NY",
    "security.device": "MacBook Pro",

  }
}

Create a new email template with fallback syntax validation. 

⚠️ **IMPORTANT**: The system validates fallback syntax to prevent Handlebars parsing errors.

✅ **Valid fallback syntax**: `{{variable|fallback_value}}`
❌ **Invalid fallback syntax**: `{{variable|text with {{nested}} variables}}`

**Error codes**:
- `INVALID_FALLBACK_SYNTAX`: Nested variables in fallback values
- `VALIDATION_ERROR`: Missing required fields
- `TEMPLATE_EXISTS`: Template key already exists
Update an existing template.
Delete a template and all its locales.

Add a locale-specific version of a template with fallback syntax validation.

⚠️ **IMPORTANT**: The system validates fallback syntax to prevent Handlebars parsing errors.

✅ **Valid fallback syntax**: `{{variable|fallback_value}}`
❌ **Invalid fallback syntax**: `{{variable|text with {{nested}} variables}}`

**Error codes**:
- `INVALID_FALLBACK_SYNTAX`: Nested variables in fallback values
- `INVALID_LOCALE`: Invalid locale code format
- `TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND`: Template key doesn't exist

❌ **DEMONSTRATION**: This request will FAIL due to invalid nested fallback syntax.

**Expected Error**: `INVALID_FALLBACK_SYNTAX`

**Invalid patterns in this request**:
- `{{title.text|Welcome to {{company_name|Waymore}}}}`
- `{{welcome.message|welcome to {{company_name|Waymore}}!}}`
- `{{body.instruction|Click here to reset password for {{company.name|Waymore}}}}`
- `{{footer.tagline|Powered by {{company.name|Waymore}}}}`

**Fix**: Use separate variables instead of nested fallbacks.
